cs.GT, cs.AI, cs.EC, cs.DS, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with mechanism design for fair division, which is a topic that falls under the category of game theory (cs.GT). The paper also proposes a new mechanism that discards a fraction of allocated resources to incentivize truthful reporting, which involves optimization and decision-making (cs.AI). The paper also discusses approximation guarantees, which is a common topic in algorithmic game theory (cs.EC). The paper also involves mathematical proofs and analysis, which falls under the category of data structures and algorithms (cs.DS). Finally, the paper also discusses connections to VCG-based mechanism design, which is a topic in machine learning and optimization (cs.LG).
